actionCalls.description: Log entry for the fault paths
actionCalls.name: Error_Log
actionCalls.label: Error Log

assignments.description: Each case is added to a new collection that will be used for the data table
assignments.name: Add_Case_to_new_updated_Case_collection
assignments.label: Add Case to New Collection

assignments.description: Will assign the account name to the contact name for each case. Contact name will be used in the scheduling case data table
assignments.name: assignTheContactName
assignments.label: Assign Contact Name

assignments.description: Sets overlapping booking error to true
assignments.name: Set_Overlapping_Booking_Error_to_True
assignments.label: Set Overlapping Booking Error to True

rules.name: Does_duplicate_booking_exist
rules.label: Duplicate Booking Exists For Provider at this Timeslot

Flow.description:
Create new service appointment (VCV Appointment) focusing on the next available time slot.
*Release 1.20.1 - assign the Caller Name to be equal to a concatenation of the Account First and Last Name
*Release 1.18.0 - Pass in selectedTimezone to the Review subflow for VVS Link
*Release 1.16.0 - Added error for overlapping appointments (scheduled startTime cannot be within 1 hour of another start)
*Release 1.12.0 -Added a subflow to update the related cases and give notification when case is closed.
*Release 1.10.0 - Added related Scheduling case data table screen component. Updated existing elements.
*Release 1.10.0 - Added Appointment Comments field, and moved review screen and final assignment to subflow

formulas.description: DateTime representing one hour after the selected appointment start time
formulas.name: oneHourAfterStartTime

formulas.description: DateTime representing one hour before the serviceAppointment's scheduled start time.
formulas.name: oneHourBeforeStartTime

formulas.description: A concatenation of the Account First and Last Name
formulas.name: varCallerName

Flow.label: VCC New Appointment by Time

loops.description: Used to loop through the scheduling cases
loops.name: loopSchedulingCases
loops.label: Loop through Scheduling Cases

recordLookups.name: Get_MPs_Duplicate_Booking
recordLookups.label: Get MPs Duplicate Booking
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5)) OR (6 AND 7 AND 8 AND (4 OR 5))

fields.name: duplicateProviderBookedMessage
fields.fieldText: ERROR: The service resource you selected is no longer available for this service appointment. Go back to select another service appointment time or service resource.

fields.name: SelectAnotherTimeBlock
fields.fieldText: ERROR: VCV Appointment cannot be scheduled for patient within an hour of a previously scheduled VCV appointment. Please select another time.

subflows.description: Used to display confirmation screen and update related cases
subflows.name: VCC_New_Appointment_Subflow_Confirmation
subflows.label: VCC New Appointment Subflow: Confirmation

subflows.description: Subflow to set values and flow stage
subflows.name: VCC_Review_New_Appointment_Subflow
subflows.label: VCC Review New Appointment Subflow

variables.description: Specify a default time zone for Lightning Scheduler appointments.
variables.name: DefaultTimeZone

variables.description: variable to hold values of distance units
variables.name: distanceUnit

variables.description: Specify a comma-separated list of service resource IDs. Depending on the page, these IDs are used to filter work type groups, service territories, or service resources.
variables.name: FilterByResourceIds

variables.description: Specify whether to display ST OH or not
variables.name: hideStOh

variables.description: Error from overlapping within an hour time slots.
variables.name: OverlappingTimeBookingError

variables.description: Stores the API name of the scheduling policy you want to associate with the flow.
variables.name: SchedulingPolicyName
